document.heading: Collaborative Care Expansion Amendment Act of 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-185, the “Collaborative Care Expansion Amendment Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-657. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 5, 2012, and July 10, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 31, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-438 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-185 became effective on Oct. 22, 2012.
